page.title: 13Health in Alton
page.content: The health centre was built in 1974 and gives normal medical treatment by the doctors as well as chiropody, dental treatment and the chance to see specialist consultants. Young mothers come to have their babies weighed.If you have a problem the nurses in the treatment room will help you.I have been to the treatment room for a broken wrist and a Jelly Tot sweet stuck up my nose. I have been to Treloar Hospital for physiotherapy.Inside the hospital it is very tidy and the nurses are very kind.In one room there is a swimming pool for people with bad backs and in another is a man who puts rubber in your shoe for comfort. There is also an x_ray room as well as wards for people who have to stay in hospital.
